sys_ui_message.key: Streamline the donation process with our efficient management system, allowing donors to contribute money or items effortlessly, and track their impact in real-time.
sys_ui_message.message: Facilitez le processus de don avec notre système de gestion efficace, permettant aux donateurs de contribuer financièrement ou en nature sans effort, et de suivre leur impact en temps réel.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Streamline the donation process with our efficient management system, allowing donors to contribute money or items effortlessly, and track their impact in real-time.
